data.title: Matt Le Blanc splits from girlfriend of 8 years
data.meta_description: Sad celebrity break-up news: Matt LeBlanc has broken up with his girlfriend of eight years Andrea Anders, his representative has confirmed. Celebrity News on GLAMOUR.COM UK
data.text:
Sad celebrity break-up news: Matt LeBlanc has broken up with his girlfriend of eight years Andrea Anders, his representative has confirmed.

Ah man, we think he might need a friend to cry on, perhaps over a coffee at Central Perk.

The 47-year-old star and Andrea Anders have called time on their relationship and the couple are thought to have broken up months ago, his representative told Us Weekly magazine.

Matt and the 39-year-old actress were last spotted together at the Emmy Awards in August and he was seen attending his Episodes series four premiere party in Los Angeles on Monday 5 January 2015 by himself.

The actor started dating Andrea shortly after splitting from his ex-wife, former model Melissa McKnight - who he was married to for three years and had daughter Marina, 10, with - in 2006.

Andrea appeared alongside Matt in his Friends spin-off show Joey for two years, in which she starred as his titular character's ditzy next door neighbour Alex.
